verses.1: Tua ciangin Dawimangpaʼ ze-etna a thuak dingin Kha Siangtho in gamlak ah Jesu a paipih hi.
verses.2: Jesu in sun sawm li le zan sawm li sung an ne loin om khin ahih manin a gil a kial hi.
verses.3: Tua ciangin ama kiangah Dawimangpa hong pai a, “Pasianʼ Tapa na hih takpi leh hih suangte anlum a suah nadingin thu pia in,” a ci hi.
verses.4: Ahi zongin Jesu in, “Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Anlum bek tawh mite nungta lo a, Pasian genkhiat thute tawh nungta zaw hi,’ ci-in kigelh hi lo ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
verses.5: Tua ciangin Dawimangpa in gamlak panin Jerusalem khua ah Jesu paipih a, biakinn khumzang a sang pen munah a kah toh pih khit ciangin,
verses.6: “Pasianʼ Tapa taktak na hih leh Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Pasian in nang a hong kem dingin a vantung mite hong sawl ding hi. Na khete le suang a kitah khak loh nadingin vantung mite in a khut uh tawh nang hong dom ding hi,’ ci-in kigelh ahih manin, hih lai panin tuak suk in,” a ci hi.
verses.7: Jesu in, “Lai Siangtho mahah, ‘Na Topa Pasian na ze-et kei in,’ ci-in gen hi lo ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
verses.8: Tua ciangin Dawimangpa in mual sang mahmah khat ah Jesu paipih to a, leitung kumpi gam khempeuh le a hoihna teng a lah khit ciangin,
verses.9: “Ka mai ah kunin kei hong bia lecin hihte khempeuh nangma tungah kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.10: Jesu in, “Satan aw, tai khia in. Lai Siangtho in, ‘Na Topa Pasian bek bia inla, ama na bek sem in,’ ci hi lo ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
verses.11: Tua ciangin Dawimangpa paikhia a, vantung mite hong pai-in Jesu huhin an a vak uh hi.
verses.12: Jesu in Johan a kimatna thu a zak ciangin Galilee gam sungah va kihem hi.
verses.13: Galilee gam Nazareth khua ah omsuak loin paikhia leuleu a, Zebulun le Naftali gam sung Galilee Tuili gei-a om Kapernaum khua ah a va teeng hi.
verses.14: Tua bangin a va teenna pen kamsang pa Isaiah thugen a tun nading ahi hi. Tua a genna ah,
verses.15: “Gentail miteʼ teenna Galilee gam sung, Jordan Gun gal khat, Tuipi lam pangah a om Zebulun le Naftali gam!
verses.16: Khuamial sunga a teeng mite in khuavak lianpi mu ding uh hi. Sihna gam khuamial sungah a teeng mite tungah khuavak hong taang ding hi,” ci hi.
verses.17: Tua hun a kipan Jesu in thuhilh ding kipan a, “Vantung ki-ukna hong nai ta ahih manin kisikin na om zia uh kheel un,” ci-in thu a hilh hi.
verses.18: Galilee Tuili gei ah Jesu a pai laitakin ngabeng Peter a kici Simon le a nau Andru, ngen tawh nga khuhin a om a mu hi.
verses.19: Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Kei hong zui un; nga mat bangin pawl tampi a ngah thei mi kong suaksak ding hi,” ci hi.
verses.20: Amau tegel in zong a ngente uh nusia-in Jesu a zui pah uh hi.
verses.21: Tua lai panin a paikhiat khit uh ciangin Zebedi tapa James le Johan-te unau, a pa uh tawh gunkuang sungah ngen puah in a om mu leuleu a, amau tegel zong a sam hi.
verses.22: Amau tegel in zong gunkuang le a pa uh nusia-in Jesu a zui pah uh hi.
verses.23: Galilee gam sung khempeuh ah Jesu pai kawikawi a, amauʼ kikhopna innte ah thu hilhin, vantung ki-ukna hangin lungdamna thute hilh a, natna tuamtuam a nei cina khempeuh a damsak hi.
verses.24: Syria gam sung khempeuh ah ama thu kizel ahih manin dawivei mi, sibup mi, khut zaw khe zaw mi a kipanin natna satna a tuamtuam a nei mi khempeuh ama kiangah hong kipuak a, amah in a vekpi-in a damsak hi.
verses.25: Galilee gam, Khuapi Sawmte gam, Jerusalem khua, Judea gam le Jordan Gun gal khat gam panin mi tampi tak in Jesu a zui uh hi.
